On September 9th & 10, TBS (in Japan) will be airing "Wachigaiya Itosato," based on the novel by Asada Jiro.
   
  The official site is at http://www.tbs.co.jp/itosato/
   
  Information in English http://wiki.d-addicts.com/Wachigaiya_Itosato
   
  Given the interest in the 2004 taiga on the Shinsengumi, I'm sure someone will be uploading the raw video to d-addicts.
   
  phil
